job.title: Data Scientist, Product Analytics (Remote - U.S.)
job.description: ltstronggtatlassian can hire people in any country where we have a legal entity assuming candidates have eligible working rights and a sufficient timezone overlap with their team as our offices reopen atlassians can choose to work remotely or return to an office unless its necessary for the role to be performed in the office interviews and onboarding are conducted virtually a part of being a distributedfirst company ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtmillions of people use trello every day generating billions of data points we are looking for a savvy data scientist to examine user behavior and advise decisionmaking across the organization our data team is lean forwardthinking and remotefriendlyltbrgtltbrgtas the ideal data scientist you are someone who can do a deep technical dive and communicate effectively with others were seeking someone with strong business instincts creativity and analytics mastery who is passionate about applying these skills to drive smarter product decisions and ultimately delight our customersltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtyou will ltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtwork with other product leaders to identify high impact opportunities for analytics and align analytics ampamp data science priorities with the product roadmap and strategyltligtltligtplay with our seriously large volume of analytics data to understand insightful trends and employ this behavioral data and insights to intelligently improve user journeys and customer valueltligtltligtdrive the measurement culture and understand the impact of our product strategy including crafting and analyzing experiments and product launchesltligtltligtenvision scope and execute projects by collaborating with partners customer research data engineers and other analystsltligtltligtshare your highquality insights and recommendations to various levels of leadership to drive critical business decisionsltligtltligtfoster an extraordinary analytics culture leading by example through education and creation of selfservice tools to make a lasting change in how your partners use data to make decisionsltligtltligtunblock data questions using redshift athena databricks python r mode analytics tableaultbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtabout you ltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtbachelor or higher degree or its equivalent in computer science information technology information systems management or a closely related field of studyltligtltligtyou have experience analyzing data and experimentation in a business setting you know how to pick the right approach to a data question you know that sometimes the simplest solution is the bestltligtltligtyou enjoy collaborating with nontechnical consumers of data and turning looselydefined questions into clearly prioritized projectsltligtltligtyou are creative and inventive with a passion for deriving insights from data and telling a storyltligtltligtyoure curious about the business side of trello youre eager to get to the guts of trellos data in order to answer questions across the companyltligtltligtyoure selfmotivated and thrive when working autonomously you know when to run with something and when to ask for helpltligtltligtyoure extremely proficient when it comes to writing sql and pythonrltligtltligtyou strive to master new technology or language when the need arisesltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtbonus points for ltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtprior experience working in a remotefriendly companyltligtltligtproven experience working on projects around user acquisition retention purchasing driversltligtltligtreferenceable work with some seriously huge datasetsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtmore about our benefitsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtwhether you work in an office or a distributed team atlassian is highly collaborative and yes fun to support you at work and play we offer some fantastic perks ample time off to relax and recharge flexible working options five paid volunteer days a year for your favourite cause an annual allowance to support your learning ampamp growth unique shipit days a company paid trip after five years and lots moreltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtmore about atlassianltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtcreating software that empowers everyone from small startups to the whos who of tech is why were here we build tools like jira confluence bitbucket and trello to help teams across the world become more nimble creative and alignedcollaboration is the heart of every product we dream of at atlassian from amsterdam and austin to sydney and san francisco were looking for people who want to write the future and who believe that we can accomplish so much more together than apart at atlassian were committed to an environment where everyone has the autonomy and freedom to thrive as well as the support of likeminded colleagues who are motivated by a common goal to unleash the potential of every team ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtadditional informationltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtwe believe that the unique contributions of all atlassians is the driver of our success to make sure that our products and culture continue to incorporate everyones perspectives and experience we never discriminate on the basis of race religion national origin gender identity or expression sexual orientation age or marital veteran or disability statusltbrgtltbrgtall your information will be kept confidential according to eeo guidelinesltbrgtltbrgtif your experience looks a little different from what weve identified and you think you can rock the role wed love to learn more about youltbrgtltbrgtlearn more about atlassians culture interviewing flow and hiring process by checking out our candidate resource hub
